entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -39.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -39.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -43.9°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
